#include<iostream>
using namespace std;
#include<stdio.h>
typedef long long ll;

ll gcd(ll a , ll b)
{
	if(b==0) return a ;
	else return gcd(b,a%b);
}

int main()
{
 ll t; int cas = 1;
 scanf("%lld",&t);
 while(t--)
 {
   ll a , b , c , result;

   scanf("%lld%lld%lld",&a,&b,&c);
   result = gcd(a,b);

   if(c%result==0) printf("Case %d: Yes\n",cas++);
   else printf("Case %d: No\n",cas++);

 }

	
}
